content.query:
CREATE SCHEMA STG AUTHORIZATION dbo;

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT SynapseParquetFormat
WITH ( 
        FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
     );

     CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE EmployeeStageSource
WITH (    LOCATION   = 'https://adls5005.dfs.core.windows.net/stage/employee',
          CREDENTIAL = st
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE STG.DIMEmployee
WITH 
(
  LOCATION = 'dimemployee/01',
  DATA_SOURCE = EmployeeStageSource,
  FILE_FORMAT = SynapseParquetFormat
) 
AS
SELECT cast(row_number() over (order by e.id asc) as int) as EmpllyeeID
,e.fullname as FullName
,cast(e.salary as MONEY) as Salary
,cast(e.age as INT) as Age
,CAST(e.FilePathDate as DATE) as FilePathDate
FROM LDW.vwEmployees e
ORDER BY e.id
